code: import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/Admin/Desktop/E-commerce/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var cartSlice=createSlice({name:'Cart',initialState:{items:[],totalQuantity:0},reducers:{addItemToCart:function addItemToCart(state,action){var newItem=action.payload;var exist=state.items.find(function(item){return item.id===newItem.id;});if(!exist){state.items.push(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},newItem),{},{quantity:1,totalPrice:newItem.price}));state.totalQuantity++;}},removeItemFromCart:function removeItemFromCart(state,action){var filtered=state.items.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});state.items=filtered;state.totalQuantity--;},increaseQuantity:function increaseQuantity(state,action){var newItem=action.payload;var exist=state.items.find(function(item){return item.id===newItem.id;});exist.quantity++;exist.totalPrice=exist.totalPrice+newItem.price;},decreaseQuantity:function decreaseQuantity(state,action){var newItem=action.payload;var exist=state.items.find(function(item){return item.id===newItem.id;});if(exist.quantity>1){exist.quantity--;exist.totalPrice=exist.totalPrice-newItem.price;}}}});export default cartSlice.reducer;export var cartAction=cartSlice.actions;
